content: this crew neck cardigan features dynamic stitch definition and the subtle shine of caron simply soft includes instructions for a wide variety of sizes from extra small to 5x to fit bust/chest measurement extra-small/small 28-34 71-86 5 cm medium 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm large 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm extra-large 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3 x-large 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5 x-large 56-62 142-157 5 cm you will also need 4 stitch markers and 7 buttons for this project
